title.rendered: DASH OFFROAD Big O 4×4 Deluxe Sliders with Tops

content.rendered:
Introducing the new Big O “Deluxe” Sliders. These are made with the same proven bracket design that allows maximum strength and minimum weight. The “Deluxe” model however has an added a bump at the front so to assist in pushing you away from obstacles when in reverse (I know Y62’s rarely need to reverse on a track) similar to the way the rear kicker assists in forward progress. There is now also an option for a new aluminium flat step in textured black to not just protect your 62 on the tough tracks, but look good in doing so.

To suit: Y62 Patrol STL, Ti, TiL – S1, 2, 3, 4, 5

Construction:

  • 1.75” Seamless Race Tube for an increased strength to weight ratio than mild steel.
  • CAD designed, laser cut brackets
  • Australian Made

Slider Surface: Powder coat textured black finish.

Please check with us directly for delivery times as this can change depending on stock levels.
